question: Indian shooter Ravi Kumar won the __________ medal in the men's 10m air rifle event at the 21st Commonwealth Games.
explanation: Indian shooter Ravi Kumar won the bronze medal in the men's 10m air rifle event at the 21st Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast, Australia. Ravi acquired the third spot with a score of 224.1 after 22 shots. Australia's Dane Sampson won the gold while Bangladesh's Abdullah Hel Baki claimed silver. India are now third in the Games' medal tally with 10 medals including 6 gold, 2 silver & 2 bronze.
